## üé® Color Contrast Analysis

### Body Text (‚â•7:1 required for AAA)

| Foreground | Background | Ratio | Status |
|------------|------------|-------|--------|
| bark-900 (#1F1C1A) | bark-50 (#F7F5F2) | **14.8:1** | ‚úÖ AAA Pass |
| bark-800 (#312B27) | bark-50 (#F7F5F2) | **11.2:1** | ‚úÖ AAA Pass |
| bark-700 (#443C35) | bark-50 (#F7F5F2) | **8.3:1** | ‚úÖ AAA Pass |
| bark-600 (#594F45) | bark-50 (#F7F5F2) | **6.1:1** | ‚ùå Fails AAA (passes AA 4.5:1) |

**Recommendation**: Use bark-700 or darker for body text on bark-50 backgrounds.

### Accent Colors

| Foreground | Background | Ratio | Status |
|------------|------------|-------|--------|
| white (#FFFFFF) | moss-500 (#4B8F67) | **4.9:1** | ‚úÖ AA Pass |
| white (#FFFFFF) | moss-600 (#3D7554) | **6.7:1** | ‚úÖ AAA Pass |
| moss-700 (#315D44) | moss-100 (#E6EFE8) | **7.8:1** | ‚úÖ AAA Pass |

**Recommendation**: moss-500 + white is safe for buttons. moss-700 on moss-100 is excellent for badges.

### Glass Overlay Text

| Foreground | Background | Ratio | Notes |
|------------|------------|-------|-------|
| white (#FFFFFF) | .scrim over image | **Variable** | ‚ö†Ô∏è Depends on image brightness |
| white (#FFFFFF) | .glass (semi-transparent) | **Variable** | ‚ö†Ô∏è Ensure dark background or use .scrim |

**Recommendation**: Always use `.scrim` gradient when placing white text over images. Test with light/dark images.

## ‚ôø ARIA & Keyboard Navigation

### Icon Buttons
‚úÖ All icon buttons MUST have `aria-label` attributes.

**Examples:**
```tsx
<button aria-label="Go back">
  <ArrowLeftIcon className="w-5 h-5" />
</button>

<button aria-label="Save to list">
  <BookmarkIcon className="w-5 h-5" />
</button>

<button aria-label="Share">
  <ShareIcon className="w-5 h-5" />
</button>
```

### Focus Indicators
‚úÖ All interactive elements have visible focus rings via `:focus-visible`.

**CSS Rule:**
```css
:focus-visible {
  outline: 2px solid #4B8F67; /* moss-500 */
  outline-offset: 2px;
}
```

## üîß Common Fixes

### Issue: Text on image without scrim
```tsx
// ‚ùå Bad
<img src="/hero.jpg" />
<h1 className="absolute text-white">Title</h1>

// ‚úÖ Good
<div className="relative">
  <img src="/hero.jpg" />
  <div className="scrim absolute inset-0"></div>
  <h1 className="absolute text-white z-10">Title</h1>
</div>
```

### Issue: Low contrast badge
```tsx
// ‚ùå Bad (bark-500 on bark-50 = 4.2:1)
<span className="text-bark-500 bg-bark-50">Badge</span>

// ‚úÖ Good (bark-700 on bark-50 = 8.3:1)
<span className="text-bark-700 bg-bark-50">Badge</span>

// ‚úÖ Good (moss-700 on moss-100 = 7.8:1)
<span className="text-moss-700 bg-moss-100">Badge</span>
```

### Issue: Icon button missing aria-label
```tsx
// ‚ùå Bad
<button onClick={handleShare}>
  <ShareIcon />
</button>

// ‚úÖ Good
<button onClick={handleShare} aria-label="Share this place">
  <ShareIcon />
</button>
```
